item.title: 不，这不是梦。这里是金狗农场（Golden Dog Farm），一个位于佛蒙特州绿山的金毛猎犬农场，游客可以在这里与新的毛茸茸的朋友玩耍嬉戏。更多关于如何计划参观的信息：
item.description:
No, this isn't a dream. But, it may feel like one.

It's Golden Dog Farm, a golden retriever farm located in Vermont's Green Mountains, where visitors can play and frolic with their new furry friends.

More on how to plan your visit: https://t.co/f3EI1F3LwO pic.twitter.com/jcD1aBdUiO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: "他说的都是真心话。"哈里斯副总统首次对拜登总统的热麦评论做出回应，他在评论中表示，他和以色列总理内塔尼亚胡将很快就加沙战争进行一次 "来见耶稣 "的对话。
item.description:
"He meant what he said."

Vice Pres. Harris reacted for the first time to Pres. Biden's hot mic comment in which he's heard saying he and Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu will soon have a "come to Jesus" conversation about the war in Gaza. https://t.co/LeUyCRVIhF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 去年秋天，V-22 "鱼鹰 "飞机在日本发生致命坠机事故，造成八名军人丧生，美国军方已解除对该飞机的禁飞令，为这种倾斜旋翼机三个月来的首次复飞铺平了道路。
item.description:
The U.S. military has lifted its flight ban on V-22 Osprey aircraft after a deadly crash in Japan killed eight service members last fall, paving the way for the tilt rotorcraft to fly again for the first time in three months. https://t.co/4ZruPiTChQ pic.twitter.com/8Qcimxf1sL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 就在拜登总统发表国情咨文演讲之前，奥巴马总统的前演讲稿撰写人特里-苏普拉特接受了 @ABC 新闻的采访，讨论了他作为奥巴马白宫的一员帮助撰写演讲稿的经历。
item.description:
Terry Szuplat, a former speechwriter for Pres. Obama, spoke with @ABC News just before Pres. Biden's State of the Union address to discuss his experiences helping craft the speech as part of the Obama White House. https://t.co/NEDnq9qNLl

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：第三党总统竞选运动 "无标签 "周五投票决定推出总统候选人名单--尽管候选人名单的寻找工作仍在继续。
item.description:
JUST IN: The third-party presidential movement No Labels voted Friday to move forward with a presidential ticket — though the hunt for candidates to lead the ticket continues. https://t.co/m4zTTB8GF1 pic.twitter.com/EhMSWTDqGC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 佛罗里达大学的学生周五在董事会会议外举行抗议活动，抗议该校取消所有 DEI 职位的决定。
item.description:
University of Florida students protested outside of the Board of Trustees meeting Friday over the university's decision to eliminate all of its DEI positions. https://t.co/SMRCgrTCqW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：第三党总统竞选运动 "无标签 "周五投票决定推出总统候选人名单--尽管候选人名单的寻找工作仍在继续。

item.title: 周五公布的一项调查显示，由于价格飞涨，三分之一的意大利人减少了特级初榨橄榄油的消费，而特级初榨橄榄油是地中海饮食的主要成分。
item.description:
One-third of Italians have reduced their consumption of extra virgin olive oil, a mainstay of the Mediterranean diet, due to skyrocketing prices, according to a survey released Friday. https://t.co/8mKrhOaLcv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 微软公司周五宣布，一个由俄罗斯国家支持的组织入侵了微软公司的电子邮件账户，并获得了微软核心软件系统的访问权限。
item.description:
A Russian state-backed group that Microsoft said hacked into its corporate email accounts was able to gain access to its core software systems, the company announced on Friday. https://t.co/d6ZqGCSBaP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统对以色列总理内塔尼亚胡的不满情绪与日俱增，在周四晚的国情咨文演讲结束后，拜登总统在麦克风上被热议。
item.description:
Pres. Biden's growing frustration with Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu was caught on a hot mic following Thursday night's State of the Union address. https://t.co/jsJoBPglH6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 新消息：美国经济上个月新增就业岗位27.5万个，超过经济学家预期的约20万个。但数据显示，这与1月份大约35万的新增就业人数相比仍有大幅下降：
item.description:
NEW: The U.S. economy added 275,000 jobs last month, blowing past economist expectations of about 200,000 jobs. Still, it was a substantial decline from the hiring of roughly 350,000 workers in January, data showed.

More here: https://t.co/0uTIYKKghs pic.twitter.com/2Q4E67jVZp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 新的数据显示，美国 2 月份的就业增长远远超出预期，这是一种藐视一切的实力展示，它使经济继续蓬勃发展，但也预示着 2024 年之前的高速增长将趋于平缓。
item.description:
U.S. job gains far exceeded expectations in February, a defiant show of strength that keeps the economy humming but signals a cooldown from the breakneck start to 2024, new data showed. https://t.co/iOfJMTup0c

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在过去的一年里，"无标签 "运动一直在徘徊是否参加第三方总统竞选，该运动成员将于周五召开会议，决定是否参加2024年的总统选举。
item.description:
After flirting with a third-party presidential bid over the past year, No Labels is set to hold a meeting Friday where its members intend to make a decision on whether the movement will enter the 2024 presidential election. https://t.co/AXqYtZIZkW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 副总统哈里斯在国情咨文后接受 @ABC 新闻采访时，称赞拜登总统的表现 "充满激情"，但对是否会与竞争对手唐纳德-特朗普展开辩论未置可否。
item.description:
Vice Pres. Harris, in a post-State of the Union interview with @ABC News, praised Pres. Biden's "passionate" performance — but was noncommittal on whether he will debate rival Donald Trump. https://t.co/qtYhmcZrY8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 最新消息五角大楼最新公布了美国政府数十年来对不明飞行物目击事件的调查报告，没有发现任何证据表明这些目击事件源于外星人。
item.description:
JUST IN: A newly released Pentagon review of decades of U.S. government investigations into UFO sightings has found no evidence that any of the sightings were extraterrestrial in origin. https://t.co/vj9uK9Vrh8 pic.twitter.com/nm4sJVXqaf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰总统泽连斯基周五在伊斯坦布尔与土耳其总统埃尔多安举行会谈，作为北约成员国，埃尔多安一直在努力平衡与基辅和莫斯科的密切关系，并多次表示愿意充当两国之间的和平调解人。
item.description:
Ukrainian Pres. Zelenskyy was in Istanbul on Friday for talks with Turkish Pres. Erdogan, whose NATO-member country has sought to balance its close relations with both Kyiv and Moscow and repeatedly offered to act as a peace broker between them. https://t.co/9tG2jAxyM3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国前总统特朗普在其诽谤案中获得了 9160 万美元的保释金，该案由作家 E. Jean Carroll 提起诉讼。
item.description:
BREAKING: Former Pres. Trump has secured a $91.6 million bond for the judgment in his defamation case brought by the writer E. Jean Carroll. https://t.co/CXLlMGz36e pic.twitter.com/TDMMIi8hkg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 以下是拜登总统火热的国情咨文中的七点启示：
item.description:

item.title: 英国前首相特雷莎-梅宣布，她将在今年大选时辞去议员职务，结束长达 27 年的议会生涯，其中包括在英国脱欧的动荡时期担任国家领导人的三年。
item.description:
Former British Prime Minister Theresa May has announced that she will quit as a lawmaker when an election is called this year — ending a 27-year parliamentary career that included three years as the nation’s leader during a period roiled by Brexit. https://t.co/HJUh1ScC66

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 与小马丁-路德-金牧师的弟弟结婚的民权活动家纳奥米-巴伯-金去世，享年 92 岁。
item.description:
Naomi Barber King, a civil rights activist who was married to the younger brother of the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr., has died at age 92. https://t.co/wI1U376Tn0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 联合国人权办公室在周五发表的一份报告中称，以色列在约旦河西岸和东耶路撒冷建立和扩大定居点的行为构成了战争罪。
item.description:
The establishment and expansion of Israeli settlements in the West Bank and east Jerusalem amount to a war crime, the U.N. human rights office said in a report published Friday. https://t.co/onEjQgebZm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 爱狗人士的旅行清单上可能又多了一个新的梦想旅行目的地：佛蒙特州的金毛猎犬农场。
item.description:
Dog lovers may have a new dream travel destination to add to their bucket list: a golden retriever farm in Vermont. https://t.co/3TNEcUVycN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 据尼日利亚官员称，该国西北部的武装匪徒绑架了 100 多名学童。
item.description:
Armed bandits in Nigeria have kidnapped over 100 school children in the northwestern part of the country, according to officials. https://t.co/HnLTsH17HB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 周五上午，众议院教育与劳动力委员会宣布，麻省理工学院正在接受正式调查，原因是有报告称校园内存在反犹太主义现象。
item.description:
MIT is being formally investigated by the House Education and the Workforce Committee for reports of antisemitism on campus, the group of legislators announced Friday morning. https://t.co/Pq1vxR8oU9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 2 月份，美国经济可能又创造了一个月的健康招聘业绩，再次出人意料地轻松摆脱了高利率的影响。
item.description:
The nation's economy likely produced another month of healthy hiring in February, once again brushing aside the effects of high interest rates with unexpected ease. https://t.co/UUGA9zzd4h

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统周四在今年迄今为止最耀眼的聚光灯下发表了热情洋溢、铿锵有力的国情咨文演讲--就在他准备与特朗普展开大选竞选之际。以下是他讲话中的关键时刻：
item.description:
Pres. Biden delivered a fiery and forceful State of the Union address Thursday under what may have been the brightest spotlight of the year so far — just as he gears up for a general election campaign against Trump.

Here are key moments from his address: https://t.co/UCGZhprTtt pic.twitter.com/LqtdcUmONA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 大型制药公司礼来（Eli Lilly）在好莱坞最重要的夜晚到来之前发布了一则广告，似乎是在抨击那些出于美容目的而使用糖尿病和减肥药物的名人。
item.description:
Major pharmaceutical company Eli Lilly has released an ad — ahead of Hollywood's biggest night — that appears to slam celebrities who are using diabetes and weight loss drugs for cosmetic reasons. https://t.co/2P8u8yeoCf pic.twitter.com/0q9tUDmmch

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 去年秋天，V-22 "鱼鹰 "飞机在日本发生致命坠机事故，造成八名军人丧生，美国军方已解除对该飞机的禁飞令，为这种倾斜旋翼机三个月来的首次复飞铺平了道路。
item.description:
The U.S. military has lifted its flight ban on V-22 Osprey aircraft after a deadly crash in Japan killed eight service members last fall, paving the way for the tilt rotorcraft to fly again for the first time in three months. https://t.co/ipbxjq2hi2
